data.description: Manual file locking; flock not required
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
A search on search.cpan.org for 'flock' returns mostly modules in
    the File:: namespace. I also considered IO::File::ManualFlock, but
    decided that the search results indicate a precedent for file
    locking modules being placed in the File:: namespace. Thus, I
    selected File::Mflock.

    My module does not require flock, which I believe makes it a unique
    file locking solution.
